+            </Link>

+      </List>

+

@@ -0,0 +1,58 @@
+import React from "react";
+import { Typography, Paper, List, ListItem, Link } from "@mui/material";
+
+// @ts-ignore
+const RelationComponent = ({ main, id }) => {
+  // 在main的connections中找到对应id的advisor
+  const connection = main.connections.find(
+    (conn: any) => conn._id === id
+  );
+
+  if (!connection) {
+    return (
+      <Paper sx={{ p: 2 }}>
+        <Typography variant="body1">No connection found.</Typography>
+      </Paper>
+    );
+  }
+
+  return (
+    <Paper elevation={1} sx={{ p: 2 }}>
+      <Typography variant="h5" gutterBottom>
+        Relations
+      </Typography>
+      <List>
+        {connection.relation.map((rel, index) => (
+          <ListItem key={index}>
+            <Typography variant="body1">
+              {main.name} is {rel.role} of the second advisor in {rel.class},
+              from {rel.duration.start.year}/{rel.duration.start.month} to{" "}
+              {rel.duration.end.year}/{rel.duration.end.month}.
+            </Typography>
+          </ListItem>
+        ))}
+      </List>
+      <Typography variant="h5" gutterBottom>
+        Collaborations
+      </Typography>
+      <List>
+        {connection.collaborations.map((collab, index) => (
+          <ListItem key={index}>
+            <Link
+              href={collab.url}
+              target="_blank"
+              rel="noopener noreferrer"
+              underline="hover"
+            >
+              <Typography variant="body1">
+                {collab.papername}, published in {collab.year}.
+              </Typography>
+            </Link>
+          </ListItem>
+        ))}
+      </List>
+    </Paper>
+  );
+};
+
+export default RelationComponent;

@@ -0,0 +1,74 @@
+import React from "react";
+import { Typography, Paper, List, ListItem, Link, Box } from "@mui/material";
+
+const RelationComponent = ({ main, second }) => {
+  // 在main的connections中找到对应second advisor的connection
+  const connection = main.connections.find(
+    (conn) => conn._id === second._id
+  );
+
+  if (!connection) {
+    return (
+      <Paper sx={{ p: 2 }}>
+        <Typography variant="body1">No connection found.</Typography>
+      </Paper>
+    );
+  }
+
+  return (
+    <Paper elevation={1} sx={{ p: 2 }}>
+      <Typography
+        variant="h4"
+        gutterBottom
+        component="div"
+        sx={{ textAlign: "center" }}
+      >
+        Relations
+      </Typography>
+      <List>
+        {connection.relation.map((rel, index) => (
+          <ListItem
+            key={index}
+            sx={{ display: "flex", justifyContent: "space-between" }}
+          >
+            <Box>
+              <Typography variant="h6" component="span">
+                {main.name} is {rel.role} of {second.name} in {rel.class},
+              </Typography>
+            </Box>
+            <Typography variant="h6" component="span">
+              {rel.duration.start.year}/{rel.duration.start.month} to{" "}
+              {rel.duration.end.year}/{rel.duration.end.month}
+            </Typography>
+          </ListItem>
+        ))}
+      </List>
+      <Typography
+        variant="h4"
+        gutterBottom
+        component="div"
+        sx={{ textAlign: "center" }}
+      >
+        Collaborations
+      </Typography>
+      <List>
+        {connection.collaborations.map((collab, index) => (
+          <ListItem key={index}>
+            <Link
+              href={collab.url}
+              target="_blank"
+              rel="noopener noreferrer"
+              underline="hover"
+            >
+              <Typography variant="body1">
+                {collab.papername}, published in {collab.year}.
+              </Typography>
+            </Link>
+          </ListItem>
+        ))}
+      </List>
+    </Paper>
+  );
+};
+
+export default RelationComponent;

@@ -0,0 +1,96 @@
+import React from "react";
+import {
+  Typography,
+  Paper,
+  List,
+  ListItem,
+  Link,
+  Box,
+  Card,
+  CardContent,
+  CardActions,
+  Button,
+} from "@mui/material";
+
+const RelationComponent = ({ main, second, onBack }) => {
+  const connection = main.connections.find(
+    (conn) => conn._id === second._id
+  );
+
+  if (!connection) {
+    return (
+      <Paper sx={{ p: 2 }}>
+        <Typography variant="body1">No connection found.</Typography>
+        <Button onClick={onBack} sx={{ mt: 2 }}>
+          Back
+        </Button>
+      </Paper>
+    );
+  }
+
+  return (
+    <Paper elevation={1} sx={{ p: 2 }}>
+      <Typography
+        variant="h4"
+        gutterBottom
+        component="div"
+        sx={{ textAlign: "center" }}
+      >
+        Relations
+      </Typography>
+      <List>
+        {connection.relation.map((rel, index) => (
+          <Card key={index} sx={{ marginBottom: 2 }}>
+            <CardContent
+              sx={{ display: "flex", justifyContent: "space-between" }}
+            >
+              <Box>
+                <Typography variant="body1">
+                  {main.name} is {rel.role} of {second.name} during/in{" "}
+                  {rel.class},
+                </Typography>
+              </Box>
+              <Typography variant="h6">
+                {rel.duration.start.year}/{rel.duration.start.month} to{" "}
+                {rel.duration.end.year}/{rel.duration.end.month}
+              </Typography>
+            </CardContent>
+          </Card>
+        ))}
+      </List>
+      <Typography
+        variant="h4"
+        gutterBottom
+        component="div"
+        sx={{ textAlign: "center" }}
+      >
+        Collaborations
+      </Typography>
+      <List>
+        {connection.collaborations.map((collab, index) => (
+          <Card key={index} sx={{ marginBottom: 2 }}>
+            <CardContent>
+              <Link
+                href={collab.url}
+                target="_blank"
+                rel="noopener noreferrer"
+                underline="hover"
+              >
+                <Typography variant="body1">
+                  {collab.papername}, published in {collab.year}.
+                </Typography>
+              </Link>
+            </CardContent>
+          </Card>
+        ))}
+      </List>
+      <CardActions>
+        <Button size="small" onClick={onBack}>
+          Back
+        </Button>
+      </CardActions>
+    </Paper>
+  );
+};
+
+export default RelationComponent;

===================================================================
---

@@ -0,0 +1,97 @@
+import React from "react";
+import {
+  Typography,
+  Paper,
+  List,
+  ListItem,
+  Link,
+  Box,
+  Card,
+  CardContent,
+  CardActions,
+  Button,
+} from "@mui/material";
+
+// @ts-ignore
+const RelationComponent = ({ main, second, onBack }) => {
+  const connection = main.connections.find(
+    (conn: any) => conn._id === second._id
+  );
+
+  if (!connection) {
+    return (
+      <Paper sx={{ p: 2 }}>
+        <Typography variant="body1">No connection found.</Typography>
+        <Button onClick={onBack} sx={{ mt: 2 }}>
+          Back
+        </Button>
+      </Paper>
+    );
+  }
+
+  return (
+    <Paper elevation={1} sx={{ p: 2 }}>
+      <Typography
+        variant="h4"
+        gutterBottom
+        component="div"
+        sx={{ textAlign: "center" }}
+      >
+        Relations
+      </Typography>
+      <List>
+        {connection.relation.map((rel, index) => (
+          <Card key={index} sx={{ marginBottom: 2 }}>
+            <CardContent
+              sx={{ display: "flex", justifyContent: "space-between" }}
+            >
+              <Box>
+                <Typography variant="body1">
+                  {main.name} is {rel.role} of {second.name} during/in{" "}
+                  {rel.class},
+                </Typography>
+              </Box>
+              <Typography variant="h6">
+                {rel.duration.start.year}/{rel.duration.start.month} to{" "}
+                {rel.duration.end.year}/{rel.duration.end.month}
+              </Typography>
+            </CardContent>
+          </Card>
+        ))}
+      </List>
+      <Typography
+        variant="h4"
+        gutterBottom
+        component="div"
+        sx={{ textAlign: "center" }}
+      >
+        Collaborations
+      </Typography>
+      <List>
+        {connection.collaborations.map((collab, index) => (
+          <Card key={index} sx={{ marginBottom: 2 }}>
+            <CardContent>
+              <Link
+                href={collab.url}
+                target="_blank"
+                rel="noopener noreferrer"
+                underline="hover"
+              >
+                <Typography variant="body1">
+                  {collab.papername}, published in {collab.year}.
+                </Typography>
+              </Link>
+            </CardContent>
+          </Card>
+        ))}
+      </List>
+      <CardActions>
+        <Button size="small" onClick={onBack}>
+          Back
+        </Button>
+      </CardActions>
+    </Paper>
+  );
+};
+
+export default RelationComponent;

Index: 
===================================================================

+++ 
@@ -0,0 +1,96 @@
+import React from "react";
+import {
+  Typography,
+  Paper,
+  List,
+  ListItem,
+  Link,
+  Box,
+  IconButton,
+} from "@mui/material";
+import ArrowBackIcon from "@mui/icons-material/ArrowBack";
+
+// @ts-ignore
+const RelationComponent = ({ main, second, onBack }) => {
+  const connection = main.connections.find(
+    (conn: any) => conn._id === second._id
+  );
+
+  if (!connection) {
+    return (
+      <Paper sx={{ p: 2, position: "relative" }}>
+        <Typography variant="body1">No connection found.</Typography>
+        <Box sx={{ position: "absolute", right: 8, bottom: 8 }}>
+          <IconButton onClick={onBack}>
+            <ArrowBackIcon />
+          </IconButton>
+        </Box>
+      </Paper>
+    );
+  }
+
+  return (
+    <Paper elevation={1} sx={{ p: 2, position: "relative" }}>
+      <Typography
+        variant="h4"
+        gutterBottom
+        component="div"
+        sx={{ textAlign: "center" }}
+      >
+        Relations
+      </Typography>
+      <List>
+        {connection.relation.map((rel: any, index: number) => (
+          <ListItem
+            key={index}
+            sx={{ display: "flex", justifyContent: "space-between" }}
+          >
+            <Box>
+              <Typography variant="body1">
+                {main.name} is {rel.role} of {second.name} during/in {rel.class}
+                ,
+              </Typography>
+            </Box>
+            <Typography variant="h6">
+              {rel.duration.start.year}/{rel.duration.start.month} to{" "}
+              {rel.duration.end.year}/{rel.duration.end.month}
+            </Typography>
+          </ListItem>
+        ))}
+      </List>
+      <Typography
+        variant="h4"
+        gutterBottom
+        component="div"
+        sx={{ textAlign: "center" }}
+      >
+        Collaborations
+      </Typography>
+      <List>
+        {connection.collaborations.map((collab: any, index: number) => (
+          <ListItem key={index}>
+            <Link
+              href={collab.url}
+              target="_blank"
+              rel="noopener noreferrer"
+              underline="hover"
+            >
+              <Typography variant="body1">
+                {collab.papername}, published in {collab.year}.
+              </Typography>
+            </Link>
+          </ListItem>
+        ))}
+      </List>
+      <Box sx={{ position: "absolute", right: 8, bottom: 8 }}>
+        <Tooltip info="return to list view">
+          <IconButton onClick={onBack} color="primary">
+            <ArrowBackIcon />
+          </IconButton>
+        </Tooltip>
+      </Box>
+    </Paper>
+  );
+};
+
+export default RelationComponent;

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -0,0 +1,97 @@
+import React from "react";
+import {
+  Typography,
+  Paper,
+  List,
+  ListItem,
+  Link,
+  Box,
+  Tooltip,
+  IconButton,
+} from "@mui/material";
+import ArrowBackIcon from "@mui/icons-material/ArrowBack";
+
+// @ts-ignore
+const RelationComponent = ({ main, second, onBack }) => {
+  const connection = main.connections.find(
+    (conn: any) => conn._id === second._id
+  );
+
+  if (!connection) {
+    return (
+      <Paper sx={{ p: 2, position: "relative" }}>
+        <Typography variant="body1">No connection found.</Typography>
+        <Box sx={{ position: "absolute", right: 8, bottom: 8 }}>
+          <IconButton onClick={onBack}>
+            <ArrowBackIcon />
+          </IconButton>
+        </Box>
+      </Paper>
+    );
+  }
+
+  return (
+    <Paper elevation={1} sx={{ p: 2, position: "relative" }}>
+      <Typography
+        variant="h4"
+        gutterBottom
+        component="div"
+        sx={{ textAlign: "center" }}
+      >
+        Relations
+      </Typography>
+      <List>
+        {connection.relation.map((rel: any, index: number) => (
+          <ListItem
+            key={index}
+            sx={{ display: "flex", justifyContent: "space-between" }}
+          >
+            <Box>
+              <Typography variant="body1">
+                {main.name} is {rel.role} of {second.name} during/in {rel.class}
+                ,
+              </Typography>
+            </Box>
+            <Typography variant="h6">
+              {rel.duration.start.year}/{rel.duration.start.month} to{" "}
+              {rel.duration.end.year}/{rel.duration.end.month}
+            </Typography>
+          </ListItem>
+        ))}
+      </List>
+      <Typography
+        variant="h4"
+        gutterBottom
+        component="div"
+        sx={{ textAlign: "center" }}
+      >
+        Collaborations
+      </Typography>
+      <List>
+        {connection.collaborations.map((collab: any, index: number) => (
+          <ListItem key={index}>
+            <Link
+              href={collab.url}
+              target="_blank"
+              rel="noopener noreferrer"
+              underline="hover"
+            >
+              <Typography variant="body1">
+                {collab.papername}, published in {collab.year}.
+              </Typography>
+            </Link>
+          </ListItem>
+        ))}
+      </List>
+      <Box sx={{ position: "absolute", right: 8, bottom: 8 }}>
+        <Tooltip info="return to list view">
+          <IconButton onClick={onBack} color="primary">
+            <ArrowBackIcon />
+          </IconButton>
+        </Tooltip>
+      </Box>
+    </Paper>
+  );
+};
+
+export default RelationComponent;

       </List>

 };
 
 export default RelationComponent;

commits.content:
import React from "react";



const relationBetweenTwoAdvisors = (main, second) => {
